Text: I'm guessing this is verson 0.1.3a, This is a great game,at the moment you can buy it for super cheap as its in alpha, and you get all following updates for free.

Cool game but not sure on how to get past some things... Like not sure on how to save...

And ive gotten as far as cooking some soup only for an accident to happen and then not knowing where to go from there :/.

Downloaded nice and fast but then I got this error when I tried to start it;
org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glViewport(GL11.java:3199) zombie.f.b.b(unknown source)

error problem solution:
Quote:
org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glViewport(GL11.java:3199)
zombie.f.b.b(Unknown Source)
zombie.GameApplet.gameLoop(Unknown Source)
zombie.b.run(Unknown Source)"



I think I found the solution. I had the same problem when I remembered that I have java 7. installed which is still in beta. I uninstalled and installed the latest java 6 ... the game works now as it should.

SOLUTION: remove java 7 and install java 6... worked for me.

Kind regards

This is an alpha version of game, 1.2a or something like that. You cannot save at the moment.

to not burn the house is easy just turn off the oven and go upstairs
looks like it will be good, so far though meh. Just a wee tutorial then you get shot and time skips forward forever.
when the latest version getting upped?
Lol, I hope you guys know the guy who comes to your house can be killed, just hide and wait until he goes upstairs, then go from behind him and smack him
